content: BITCHEMICAL DEFI & SWAP & NFT PLATFORMBitchemical next generation Decentralized Finance Platform. Meet the chemistry of blockchain technology. Instantly swap crypto tokens, no registration or account needed.WHITEPAPER | WEBSITE | Â APP |TWITTER | TELEGRAM  | FACEBOOK  | INSTAGRAM | MEDIUM | CMC   | WEEK 1 SEPTEMBER 01 - SEPTEMBER 07 (ENDING)WEEK 2 SEPTEMBER 08 - SEPTEMBER 14 (ENDING))WEEK 3 SEPTEMBER 15 - SEPTEMBER 21 (ENDING)LAST WEEK Â SEPTEMBER 22 -SEPTEMBER 29 (ENDING)The funds will be split into different campaigns in such a format:Twitter Campaign: 30%Facebook Campaign: 35%Telegram Campaign: 10%Instagram Campaign: 15%Reserved : 10%Total Token allocated for this bounty will be 50,000,000 of BCHEC Â Token 1 BCHEC Token List Price= 0,001 USDTELEGRAM instructions:You must be active atleast thrice a weekYou must share it to your social media accounts.Account must wear "YOURNAME | BITCHEMICALDEFIJoin here TELEGRAM Rewards5 Stakeshttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScTwczk3YBQipcvk0pWMzwb7DPZT6yE-Lr-jrLxA3hwBU2ucA/viewformRules: Account must be at least 3 months old.Must follow this page :- https://twitter.com/BitchemicalMust have at least 100 followers.Minimum of 5 retweets must be done weekly to be eligible for payment & retweets should be spread over a week not in one day.Not posting any week's retweets will mean no token will be given.You must tweet at least 2 of your original tweet about Bitchemical and use hash tags #ICO # BCHEC #BNB #BUSDRewards100-300 Followers : 12 Â stakes per week301-1000 Followers : 24 Â stakes per week1001-4000 Followers : 56 Â stakes per week4001-10000 Followers : 120 Â stakes per week10001 and above Followers : 250 Â stakes per weekFormat to post your workCode:QuoteWeek #1TwitterRetweets1.2.3.4.5.Tweets1.2.https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSch8yWrgiAjXMKUAu88lTO-BR7xViX0eKndICNWxHluHMYr1w/viewform/center]RulesAccount must be at least 3 months old.Must follow this page: - https://www.facebook.com/ChemicalDefi/Must have at least 300 Followers/Friends.You have to like and share at least 5 posts per week from our official Facebook page and should be done over a week not in one day.Rewards300-600 Followers/Friends: 12 stakes per week601-1500 Followers/Friends: 24 stakes per week1501-4000 Followers/Friends: 56 stakes per week4001+ and above Followers/Friends: 120 stakes per weekFormat to post your workCode:QuoteWeek #1FacebookShares + Likes1.2.3.4.5.https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdZcZIjSeZ3yZXR6goCMHOKzoSTUTJfzEtXfI2AHMuIxTFH2Q/viewformRulesMake sure that you fill in all the relevant information on the participation form.Subscribe to the official https://www.instagram.com/bitchemicaldefi/You are only allowed to use one account and it needs to be your own account that is at least 1 months old.Your account must have more than 300 followers. The account should be open to everyone. Locked accounts cannot receive rewards.You can use the pictures in our official account for sharing.The Post using information in website and tag as #bitchemical. This need to be done over week week not in one day Â If we dont have any official post please make your own unique post with #BCHEC #ICO #bitchemicalEvery Post that you make regarding anything about the ICO, you need to include the following: A tag to the official page, as well as include #bitchemicalRewards300-600 Followers/Friends: 12 stakes per week601-1500 Followers/Friends: 24 stakes per week1501-4000 Followers/Friends: 56 stakes per week4001+ and above Followers/Friends: 120 stakes per weekFormat to post your workCode:QuoteWeek #1InstagramShares + Likes1.2.3.4.5.https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc8yhRYamPB6sXoAwY2qrqOs8U00BcKpmiywu9LBRDSHXeF0g/viewformThe campaign is aimed at popularization of Bitchemical Defi. project by posting videos, animated content, and explaining key aspects and theses of the project. Any participation is welcome, just do not forget the rules, that we have listed below: - Using fake accounts, bots and multi-accounts is strictly prohibited.- Video must be published and have public access.- Video should be original without copyright infringement.- Minimal number of followers of the person who would like to participate in Bounty campaign - 100- Video should contain overview of individual system parts or entire project. Video length should be at least 3 minutes.- Reward can be received only for single item. In case video is published on multiple video hosting platforms reward will not be provided. - Verification of user activity and accrual of stakes take place 15 October 2022ðŸ‘‰Followers 100-1000 Â : Â 250,000 BCHEC TokenðŸ‘‰Followers 1001-5000 Â : Â 500,000 BCHEC TokenðŸ‘‰Followers 5001-10,000 Â : Â 1000,000 BCHEC TokenðŸ‘‰Followers 10,001-50,000 Â : Â 2500,000 BCHEC TokenðŸ‘‰Followers 50,001-100,000 Â : Â 5000,000 BCHEC TokenðŸ‘‰Followers 100,001-500,000 Â : Â 10,000,000 BCHEC TokenPlease fill out the form for participation:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSex43n6ah-aekMBSlqCbkU24IiBtj1pC4GUVDp_54QsHPNyQw/viewformBLOG CAMPAIGNÂ Â  Â  Â  Â  The campaign is aimed at popularization of Bitchemical Defi project through media resources, blogs and other sites for dissemination of information in the text form. Any participation is welcome, just do not forget the rules, that we have listed below: - Blogs and other textual information must be published and have public access.- Text should be original. You can also use official images, logos, graphics posts from our web-page, ANN branches, Bitchemical Defi, Facebook, Twitter, Medium, Linkedin..- Â Pages without visits, without target audience are not allowed to participate. The profile must be active for at least 3 months. You can use any resources to publish blogs with high attendance of users (for example, Medium, BitcoinTalk...)- Text must contain at least 2000 characters. Low-quality content does not entail receiving a reward.- Verification of user activity and accrual of stakes take place 15 October 2022ðŸ‘‰Good Articles : Â 500,000 BCHEC TokenðŸ‘‰Very Good Articles : 1,000,000 BCHEC TokenðŸ‘‰Perfect Articles Â : 2,500,000 BCHEC TokenPlease fill out the form for participation: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScOgwNRXxMylRaTs369I4eqW4Cj0JOQ2UcNEASL3VI9zIIhCw/viewformSPREADSHEET : https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ZDdKx2M52q6SxAcIqjTx8nBvUM5SQj89LLKQHoY36so/edit?usp=sharing
